detail_desc: Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Lace dress with a zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves and an airy chiffon skirt. Jersey lining.
Wide blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck with buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button, narrow buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, side stripes and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Fitted jersey top with a wide neckline and short sleeves.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Cap in a patterned weave with a soft, lightly brushed finish. Small appliqué on the front, a cotton sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Leather belt with an antiqued metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Cotton twill shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Shirt in an organic cotton weave with buttons and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Short slits in the sides.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers. Striped, long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers in cotton jersey with a fly and button, decorative side pockets and a back pocket.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button. Side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.

Short dress in smocked cotton jersey with short, jersey-lined balloon sleeves in cotton poplin with pleats at the top and concealed elastication at the hems for added width. Small overlocked frill at the hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in waffled jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a turtle neck, roll edges and long wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Decorative seam down the front and back.
Jumper in a fine knit with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in crinkled velour with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Long puff sleeves with reinforced organza shoulder sections and a pleat at the cuffs for added width.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the top. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.
Shorts woven in a cotton blend with elastication and a sewn-on, adjustable belt with a plastic fastener at the waist. Side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knee-length nursing dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons at the top and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a draped effect. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with elasticated cuffs.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and on the shoulder straps, and a small bow at the back. Lined gusset.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Soft faux fur jacket with a collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Backpack in soft imitation leather with a zip at the top, padded, adjustable shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment with a small appliqué on the front. Lined. Depth 12 cm. Width 29 cm. Height 35.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and slim legs with decorative seams at the knees and narrow hems.
Treggings in stretch fabric, two pairs in denim, and one pair in twill. Adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Jumpsuit in a slightly stretchy, patterned cotton weave with a wrapover front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, a detachable tie belt, side pockets and short puff sleeves with pleats. Ankle-length, slightly tapered legs.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sleeveless maxi dress in soft jersey made from a modal blend with a V-neck, spaghetti straps, a double layer at the top and a slit in one side.
Loose-fitting vest top in soft modal jersey with a rounded hem.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long metal earrings with rings and velvet-covered plastic beads. Length 9.5 cm.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Backpack in nylon with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded mesh back plate. Lined. Size 13x28x57 cm (when open).
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Swim shorts in a block-coloured stretch weave with lacing and elastication at the waist, a fly with a hook and loop fastening and side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a sewn-in metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Hair claw in metal with a cut-out pattern.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short dress in soft cotton denim with a gently tapered waist. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Chinos in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Cropped, fitted top in ribbed jersey with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Round-necked T-shirt in airy linen jersey.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Longer, quilted nylon down jacket with a detachable faux fur-lined hood. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and decorative wrapover front. Side pockets, a concealed zip at the back and a slit at the hem. Unlined.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
